name: Organized Simplicity: The Clutter-Free Approach to Intentional Living (SIGNED COPY)
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Books ordered through me will ship 1-2 weeks from your order date. You will receive no confirmation/notice of shipment besides your Paypal receipt. Thanks for your understanding, and for your support by buying direct!

Simple living isn't about what you give up. It's about what you gain. Organized Simplicity will convince you that simple living is the absolute best way to live. Whether it's house cleaning, managing your family schedule, stewarding your money, or deciding what "stuff" you allow within your four walls, the only way to live well is to do so intentionally and simply.

The first half of Organized Simplicity explores why realistic simple living is a good idea. Think we've always lived with an average of 900 square feet per family member? Feel like your children need two extra-curricular activities per semester to thrive in today's culture? Do you believe there's such a thing as good debt? Maybe not. The first eight chapters dive into these topics, essential for the foundation of simple living.

The second half gives you a nail to hang the how behind living simply discussed in the first half. You'll have learned what simple living means to you, so you'll be given tools to roll up your sleeves and get to work, making your home work for you, not against you.

Above all, Organized Simplicity redefines the popular buzzword "simple living," so that a busy family -- living in the real world -- can make practical changes that work for everyone. You'll be able to sleep at night, knowing everything in your life is pointed in one direction.

Head here to see the inside of the book.
